attributes.action: Rethink the ban on smoking in the British Legion
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I think that the smoking ban in British Legions should be removed . My reason for this thinking is , how can anyone expect brave old soldiers some of whom are in their 90's to go out side for a cigarette. Please remember when these brave  boys were serving this country they were encoraged to smoke . So i would ask you to please think again .
